law.text: Foreign-trained occupational therapists who apply to be licensed by the board shall furnish proof of good moral character and shall present proof indicating the completion of educational requirements equal to or greater than those contained in KRS 319A.110 and examination requirements of KRS 319A.120.
law.history: Amended 2002 Ky. Acts ch. 14, sec. 12, effective July 15, 2002. -- Amended 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 199, sec. 1, effective July 15, 1996. -- Created 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 78, sec. 18, effective July 15, 1986.
